songs.title: Straight Up
songs.lyrics:
[Hook 1: Pouya]
Straight up
Straight up
Double S bitch, we straight up
I'ont really flex, I'm straight up
None of you hoes gone phase us
Straight up
Straight up
Pouya ho, straight up
Buffet boys, straight up
Fuck you ho, straight up
Straight up
Straight up
Don't lie, just keep it straight up
I gotta keep it straight up
My stunnas boy we straight up
Straight up
Straight up
Don't lie, just keep it straight up
I gotta keep it straight up
Smart stunnas boy we straight up
Straight up

[Verse 1]
Ho don't flex on little pou
No need to lie, so just tell me the truth
Fuck boy, talkin outta turn, get da boot
I beat yo ass in a boot, knock a tooth out ya mouth
Now you lookin like J. Cole
Wit a crooked smile
Now it's case closed
Straight up, workin hard, hope it pay off, so I could chill
Fuck a bitch, get a day off, and just
Vibe, get a little peace at mine
Vacation time, wit a dime right by me
Everybody wanna be right by me, but where was you when I neeeded somebody?
So quit the frontin, actin up and claiming you my homie
All that shit bologna, phony, watch him fall below me, so bitch blow me
Fuck they talkin bout
Take yo shit and walk it out
Pouya ho, are you feelin it now, you copy my style
But its cool
You still go to school, you little young ass pussy
I been on my own, since my mom stopped cooking
I'm a real ass dude since I dropped out of school
I been on my grind but you claim I'm a fool

[Hook 2]
Straight up
Straight up
Double S bitch, we straight up
I'ont really flex, I'm straight up
None of you hoes gone phase us
Straight up
Straight up
Pouya ho, straight up
Buffet boys, straight up
Fuck you ho, straight up
Straight up
Straight up
Don't lie, just keep it straight up
I gotta keep it straight up
My stunnas boy we straight up
Straight up
Straight up
Don't lie, just keep it straight up
I gotta keep it straight up
Smart stunnas boy we straight up
Straight up
